title: Dub techno LT - Vejopatis - Taskas MP3
description:
Taskas

by Vejopatis

Deep and melancholic dub techno vibes, with some ancient Lithuanian folk singing, and beautiful soundscapes.


Please, if you like this artist and would like to support underground electronic music lable Cold Tear Records, you can buy the CD

VÃ„â€”jopatis is a dub techno artist and a musician from Lithuania. Started to make electronic music when he was still going to school. Went through a lot of different styles and genres. Nikolaj (his real name) was into ambient and chill out, but after he found out about dub techno, he realised that this is the genre where he can  put together rhythm and ambience.

I can see nature in the city at night. City traffic is like a river, even the sound is similair to a river. Flat apartaments is like concrete forest.
